article: How to Do an Evil Laugh
intro: Doing a great evil laugh requires more than just letting out a cackle. By getting in an evil mood, using your body language to enhance your laugh and manipulating your voice, you can sound truly evil.

steps.title: Wear something that makes you feel evil or mysterious.
steps.subtitle: Lots of villains with evil laughs have unusual looks. The more you feel like a villain and the less you feel like you, the more otherworldly and successful your evil laugh will be. You could don deathly, dark-colored clothes or try an unhinged wardrobe thatâ€™s layered and mismatched.
